Articles.Content:
I've lurked here for some time and finally decided I wanted to join you guys in saying things and showing off whatever cool things I manage to churn out.

![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Well, I'll have to check the blender often! Surely that's how NASA generates their rocket ideas, right?
I dunno, but that's how I do it!
I also enjoy saying things. Such as, "Welcome to the forum. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) "

Welcome, FungusForge!

You,ve come to a nice place fr sure.

Be seeing you in orbit.
